member.returns: The sound clip of the requested sound.

member.name: M:MW.Conversion.Conversion.ColourHex(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a hexadecimal to its corresponding colour.
member.param: The hexadecimal in the format: "#RRGGBB"; where '#' denotes a hexadecimal, 'RR' denotes the Red colour channel, 'GG' denotes the Green colour channel and 'BB' denotes the Blue colour channel.

member.name: M:MW.Conversion.Conversion.ColourHex(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: The corresponding hexadecimal and alpha colour.

The float alpha.

member.name: M:MW.Conversion.Conversion.ColourHex(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The corresponding hexadecimal colour and hexadecimal alpha.
member.param: The hexadecimal in the format: "#RRGGBB"; where '#' denotes a hexadecimal, 'RR' denotes the Red colour channel, 'GG' denotes the Green colour channel and 'BB' denotes the Blue colour channel.
The hexadecimal in the format: "#AA"; where '#' denotes a hexadecimal and 'AA' denotes the Alpha channel.
